name: Quamoco
tagline: Open Quality Model and Tool Support for Quality Modelling and Evaluation
body:
The Quamoco open quality model and evaluation tool allows to build detailed, fully operationalised quality models for software. It contains a base model with operationalisations for Java and C#.

Quamoco started as a German research project 2008â€“2012 and has been fully open source under the Apache licence since end of 2011.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
